Detailed Description

Encapsulates an object used for creating intdif input files

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum gigide::IntderWriter::TransformationType

The type of tranformation for intder to perform

Enumerator:

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gigide::IntderWriter::IntderWriter ( boost::intrusive_ptr< Molecule >  mol,
bool  statpt,
TransformationType  type,
int  nder,
boost::intrusive_ptr< DerivativeIterator >  iter,
std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr< SimpleInternalCoordinate > >  simples,
std::vector< boost::intrusive_ptr< InternalCoordinate > >  coords,
bool  includexyz = true 
)

Constructor

Parameters:
mol The molecule upon which finite difference are being done
statpt Whether or not the object being treated is a stationary point
type The transformation type, whether cartesian to internals or internals to cartesians
nder The level of derivative being transform
iter The iterator for printing derivatives in the input file. This may be null if no internal coordinate derivatives are to be printed
simples 
coords 
includexyz Whether to print xyz coordinates in input file. If false, gets coordinates from file11.

void IntderWriter::writeHeader (  )  [virtual]

Adds a header for the file. By defalt, does nothing.

Reimplemented from gigide::InputFileWriter.

void IntderWriter::writeMasses (  ) 

Writes the xyz coordinates to the file. No parameter is needed since this will come from the molecule passed to the constructor.

void IntderWriter::writeSimpleCoordinates (  ) 

Writes simple internal coordinates to the input file

void IntderWriter::writeSymmetryCoordinates (  ) 

Writes a symmetry internal coordinate description to the input file

void IntderWriter::writeXYZ (  ) 

Writes the xyz coordinates to the file. No parameter is needed since this will come from the molecule passed to the constructor.
